message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am able to pay up to $8500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9250.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can come up with a compromise. I am willing to pay $8750 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $8750. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $9100.
